channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says Democratic lawmakers' video is 'seditious behavior, punishable by death'
item.description: The Democratic lawmakers said that members of the military can and must refuse illegal orders by their superiors.

item.title: The CDC revives debunked 'link' between childhood vaccines and autism

item.title: Recalled baby formula linked to a botulism outbreak may still be in some stores
item.description: A botulism outbreak that has sickened more than two dozen babies in 15 states has been linked to ByHeart formula sold nationwide. Here's what to know ...

item.title: 'Huge columns of smoke': BBC at the scene of fire at COP30

item.title: Bush lauds Dick Cheney as a 'thinker and listener' at funeral
item.description: Cheney died aged 84 from complications of pneumonia and cardiac and vascular disease in early November.

item.title: Zelensky to speak to Trump after US proposes Russia-Ukraine peace plan
item.description: The plan was reportedly drafted by US and Russian officials, without Ukraine's involvement.

item.title: Federal immigration crackdown ends in Charlotte, North Carolina, sheriff says

item.description: Home equity loan and HELOC interest rates remained under 8% this week. Here's what homeowners should do in response.

item.title: Judge says Trump official's testimony on removing Abrego Garcia is "a zero"
item.description: The Trump administration is pushing to remove Kilmar Abrego Garcia from the U.S. ahead of his criminal trial on human smuggling charges next year.
